markets.name: Balogun Market
markets.description: One of the largest markets in Lagos, offering a variety of goods from textiles to electronics.

markets.name: Lekki Market
markets.description: Known for unique arts and crafts, perfect for souvenirs and cultural artifacts.

events.title: Lagos Market Festival
events.details: A day-long celebration featuring music, food, and local crafts.

events.title: Arts and Crafts Workshop
events.details: Learn to make traditional Nigerian crafts with local artisans.
